task_summary: The robot must reach the blue pen while actively avoiding the obstacle (books block) visible in the scene.

task_long_description.overview: This episode features a white articulated robot arm operating on a tabletop cluttered with books (obstacle) and a blue pen standing upright in a holder. The goal is to navigate from the left side of the books to the pen, requiring perception of both objects and a collision‑free approach. Robust perception and alignment are critical due to occlusions and possible workspace constraints.
preconditions: obstacle block present between start and goal
stepwise_plan: Perceive the blue pen location; retry if needed
Detect obstacle block to establish avoidance
Plan and execute collision‑free movement to side of books (waypoint)
Approach and align precisely toward pen
failure_and_recovery: Perception failure (pen not found): retry scan for target
Blocked path: verify obstacle block, plan alternate approach
Robot contact with obstacle: abort approach, retry from previous waypoint
task_long_description.termination: When robot is at the blue pen location (validated by IsAt condition) or on unrecoverable error.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: avoid obstacle and reach the blue pen

node_specs.description: Checks whether the blue pen is visible.
Scans using a line pattern to locate the blue pen up to three times.
Detects and localizes the blue pen in the workspace.
Checks whether the obstacle block is visible.
Detects the obstacle block for navigation planning.
Moves to a position past the obstacle toward the pen.
Validates arrival at the pen's location.

failure_modes: Pen not visible due to occlusion
Collision with obstacle block or books
recovery_strategy: Retry ScanForTarget if pen not found
Re-detect obstacle block if navigation fails
Abort and retry approach if collision detected
assumptions: Frames indicate no grasp/manipulation, only navigation and collision avoidance are required
Obstacle in fact consists of books, mapped as obstacle_block; no direct manipulation of obstacle shown
Instruction does not specify ‘grasp’ or ‘pick’, frames confirm no such actions occur

expected_success_criteria: Robot end-effector reaches or aligns next to the blue pen without disturbance
